languages.text: "Ну это... Немезит — не герой никакой, а обманщик".
"So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"
languages.original_text: "Ну это... Немезит — не герой никакой, а обманщик".

traits.locale_text: "So there you have it... Nemesite is no hero, he is a deceiver."
"So there you have it... Nemesite is no hero, he is a deceiver."
"So… this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He is a deceiver."
"So… this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He is a deceiver."
"So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"
"So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"

languages.text: "So ... dann ist dieser Nemesit also gar kein Held. Er geht nur herum und hintergeht die Leute!"
languages.original_text: "So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"

traits.locale_text: "So ... dann ist dieser Nemesit also gar kein Held. Er geht nur herum und hintergeht die Leute!"

languages.text: «Al final resulta que ese Nemesitio no es un héroe. ¡Solo se dedica a ir por ahí engañando a la gente!».
languages.original_text: "So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"

traits.locale_text: «Al final resulta que ese Nemesitio no es un héroe. ¡Solo se dedica a ir por ahí engañando a la gente!».

languages.text: 「つまり…ネメサイトはヒーローじゃなかったのか。あちこちでみんなを騙し回ってたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり…ネメサイトはヒーローじゃなかったのか。あちこちでみんなを騙し回ってたんだ！」

languages.text: “也就是说……这个涅墨斯特根本不是什么英雄，不过是个骗子而已！”
languages.original_text: "So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说……这个涅墨斯特根本不是什么英雄，不过是个骗子而已！”

languages.text: « Alors, en fin de compte... ce Némésite n'est pas un héros. Rien qu'un escroc qui berne son monde ! »
languages.original_text: "So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, en fin de compte... ce Némésite n'est pas un héros. Rien qu'un escroc qui berne son monde ! »

languages.text: "Yani... Nemezit kahraman falan değilmiş. İnsanları kandırıyormuş."
languages.original_text: "So... this Nemesite is not a hero after all. He just goes around tricking people!"
